[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gnaudio/jabra-js](./jabra-js.md) &gt; [IMultiInitialState](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.md) &gt; [muted](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.muted.md)

## IMultiInitialState.muted property

`true` to mute the device and `false` to unmute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
muted?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Can only be set to `true` if [IMultiInitialState.ongoingCalls](./jabra-js.imultiinitialstate.ongoingcalls.md) is a positive integer (greater than zero).
